code-sniffer: vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=vendor/spryker/code-sniffer/Spryker/ruleset.xml src && tput setaf 2;echo Good Style!; tput sgr0;
architecture-sniffer: vendor/bin/phpmd src/ text  vendor/spryker/architecture-sniffer/src/ruleset.xml --minimumpriority=2 && tput setaf 2;echo Good Architecture!; tput sgr0;
phpstan: vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --no-progress --verbose && tput setaf 2; echo Good Static Typing!; tput sgr0;
